name: OUTSIDE (itch) (Leshiy, fannd_nl)
description:
We all like to sink into the autumn blues while sitting in our room, but we can’t let this feeling take over. Help Gregory the Rabbit overcome his fears and get outside to the autumn festival

Help Gregory the rabbit get out of the motel room and find the strength to talk to outside strangers

music by etoti

Cozy Auttumn:
* What makes Autumn cozy for us: heart-to-heart conversations even with unfamiliar people, the atmosphere of an autumn holiday and a warm collective
* Auttumn Glow Pallete: has been used
* One room only: More than one room
